Package com.example.butter

Class HomeFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.butter.HomeFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class HomeFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
A simple Fragment subclass. Uses newInstance(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) to create an instance of this fragment. This fragment is used to set up the home screen on the admins side and the entrants (or both entrant and organizers) side. The admins have access to a spinner and the entrants will have access to only the upcoming and waiting list events.
